page.title: 17Hunton Institute: Classes
page.content: This is a good centre for meetings. {W.I.}Monday evening,monthly.35 members enjoy a varied programme of visiting speakers. This year they have competed successfully in group Handicraft and Produce classes at local shows. Darts is popular. In summer the team won the Lower Wensleydale Cup. {KEEP FIT }Monday 8pm.to 9pm. 18 ladies relax and exercise to recorded music. {WHIST DRIVES }Thursday evenings,weekly attract players from long distances. The revenue helps greatly towards the upkeep of the rooms. {MOTHERS and TODDLERS}meet on Wednesday afternoons. All our school took part in a summer Concert to raise money for this new venture. 15 Toddlers joined. {The School}hire the Institute twice a a week for drama, P.E. or Games. {A "China Painting" L.E.A. Night Class is held in the school in the winter.
